abstract: Bringing the community of Castlemaine together over lunch. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Mount Alexander'.
description: The Castlemaine Community Lunch is a weekly event organised by the Castlemaine Community House. It brings people together in a warm and welcoming environment, encouraging and nurturing friendships and connections. Attended by locals, old and new, it is also a chance to welcome newcomers into the community.
